posts.name: Eloy Ruiz
posts.cooked:
Hi,
my Signal-Server, registration-service and Signal-Server working but now I’m having a problem trying to run the CDSi.
The server is working in dev mode and this is my application.yml file:

micronaut:
  application:
    name: cdsi
  executors:
    enclave-jni:
      type: fixed
      # Note: this must never exceed `NumTCS` in `cds.conf`
      number-of-threads: 1
  metrics:
    enabled: true
    export:
      statsd:
        enabled: false
  server:
    netty:
      # don't compress
      compression-threshold: 1073741824  # 1G
      compression-level: 0

logger:
  levels:
    # The Cosmos client is pretty chatty
    com.azure.cosmos: WARN

endpoints:
  all:
    port: 8081

leakyBucketLimit:
  connections:
    bucket-size: 10
    leak-rate-scalar: 10
    leak-rate-duration: PT1M

tokenRateLimit:
  # 6 permits/hr -> 52560 permits per year
  bucket-size: 50000
  leak-rate-scalar: 6
  leak-rate-duration: PT1H

authentication:
  # This shared secret is randomly-generated and is not actually shared with anything at all
  sharedSecret: <my-base64-encoded-32-byte-secret>

In my Signal-Server secrets file I have this for the directoryV2 configuration:

directoryV2.client.userAuthenticationTokenSharedSecret: <my-base64-encoded-32-byte-secret>
directoryV2.client.userIdTokenSharedSecret: <my-base64-encoded-32-byte-secret>

My Android app makes a call to /v2/directory/auth and gets a JSON with username & password. After that it tries a call to my CDSi server getting this error on the Android Studio logs:

2025-05-15 00:04:59.724 29070-29243 libsignal               com.my.app              I  /home/libsignal/src/rust/net/src/cdsi.rs:338: connecting to CDSI endpoint
2025-05-15 00:05:00.265 29070-29238 libsignal               com.my.app              W  /home/libsignal/src/rust/net/src/cdsi.rs:342: CDSI connection failed: websocket error: rejected by server with error code 401 Unauthorized
2025-05-15 00:05:00.269 29070-30204 ContactSelectionActivit com.my.app              W  null
                                                                                                    java.io.IOException: org.signal.libsignal.net.NetworkProtocolException: HTTP error: 401 Unauthorized
                                                                                                    	at org.whispersystems.signalservice.api.SignalServiceAccountManager.getRegisteredUsersWithCdsi(SignalServiceAccountManager.java:268)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.contacts.sync.ContactDiscoveryRefreshV2.refreshInternal(ContactDiscoveryRefreshV2.kt:157)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.contacts.sync.ContactDiscoveryRefreshV2.refreshAll(ContactDiscoveryRefreshV2.kt:50)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.contacts.sync.ContactDiscoveryRefreshV2.refreshAll$default(ContactDiscoveryRefreshV2.kt:46)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.contacts.sync.ContactDiscovery$refreshAll$1.invoke(ContactDiscovery.kt:73)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.contacts.sync.ContactDiscovery$refreshAll$1.invoke(ContactDiscovery.kt:69)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.contacts.sync.ContactDiscovery.refreshRecipients(ContactDiscovery.kt:161)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.contacts.sync.ContactDiscovery.refreshAll(ContactDiscovery.kt:69)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.ContactSelectionActivity$RefreshDirectoryTask.doInBackground(ContactSelectionActivity.java:160)
                                                                                                    	at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.ContactSelectionActivity$RefreshDirectoryTask.doInBackground(ContactSelectionActivity.java:149)
                                                                                                    	at android.os.AsyncTask$3.call(AsyncTask.java:394)
                                                                                                    	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:264)
                                                                                                    	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
                                                                                                    	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:644)
                                                                                                    	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1012)
                                                                                                    Caused by: org.signal.libsignal.net.NetworkProtocolException: HTTP error: 401 Unauthorized

The CDSi seems to be well configured as I can do a GET https://mycdsidomain.com/actuator/health and I get this JSON alongside status 401:

{
    "message": "Unauthorized",
    "_links": {
        "self": {
            "href": "/actuator/health",
            "templated": false
        }
    },
    "_embedded": {
        "errors": [
            {
                "message": "Unauthorized"
            }
        ]
    }
}

Any idea of what can be wrong?

Thank you!

posts.name: Apex
posts.cooked:
U should update libsignal.
The enclave ID & servers’ urls are hardcoded in libsignal.

suggested_topics.fancy_title: Is the Signal Server developed on GitHub?
